terms.जातवेदः: Jataveda (another name for Agni, meaning "one who knows all beings")

shankarachary-comm.meaning: They addressed the Fire thus “O Jataveda! Find out what this Great Spirit is.” He said “yes.”
shankarachary-comm.comm: The Devas not knowing what that Spirit was, being afraid of it, and desirous to know what it was, thus addressed Agni who went before them and who was little less than omniscient. “O Jataveda, learn well what this Great Spirit now in our view is. You are the brightest of us all.” “Be it so” said Agni

meaning: Meaning: They said to Agni (fire), "Jataveda, understand what this is and what it is capable of." They repeated it in this manner.
